# Walking After Midnight (1992 film)

}}
Walking After Midnight () is a 1992 Turkish drama film directed by Atıf Yılmaz.
Cast
* Meral Oğuz - Nilgün
* Lale Mansur - Havva
* Yaman Okay - Nafiz
*  - Faruk
* Sema Çeyrekbaşı - Sükran
* Memduh Ün - Ali
*  - Hacer
*  - Olay
